input: Write a SQL query to find all users over age 18
context: Database schema: users(id, name, email, age)

input: Create a query to get the top 5 products by sales
output: SELECT product_name, SUM(quantity) as total_sales FROM sales GROUP BY product_name ORDER BY total_sales DESC LIMIT 5;
expected: SELECT product_id, SUM(quantity) FROM sales GROUP BY product_id ORDER BY SUM(quantity) DESC LIMIT 5;
context: Database schema: sales(id, product_id, product_name, quantity, price, sale_date)
